games.saloon

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.saloon.GameObject
        • games.saloon.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends GameObject
    A Tile in the game that makes up the 2D map grid.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Bottle bottle
      The beer Bottle currently flying over this Tile.
      Cowboy cowboy
      The Cowboy that is on this Tile, null otherwise.
      static java.lang.String[] DIRECTIONS
      The list of all valid directions Tiles can be in
      Furnishing furnishing
      The furnishing that is on this Tile, null otherwise.
      boolean hasHazard
      If this Tile is pathable, but has a hazard that damages Cowboys that path through it.
      boolean isBalcony
      If this Tile is a balcony of the Saloon that YoungGuns walk around on, and can never be pathed through by Cowboys.
      Tile tileEast
      The Tile to the 'East' of this one (x+1, y).
      Tile tileNorth
      The Tile to the 'North' of this one (x, y-1).
      Tile tileSouth
      The Tile to the 'South' of this one (x, y+1).
      Tile tileWest
      The Tile to the 'West' of this one (x-1, y).
      int x
      The x (horizontal) position of this Tile.
      int y
      The y (vertical) position of this Tile.
      YoungGun youngGun
      The YoungGun on this tile, null otherwise.

        The beer Bottle currently flying over this Tile.

      • cowboy

        The furnishing that is on this Tile, null otherwise.

      • hasHazard

        public boolean hasHazard
        If this Tile is pathable, but has a hazard that damages Cowboys that path through it.

      • isBalcony

        public boolean isBalcony
        If this Tile is a balcony of the Saloon that YoungGuns walk around on, and can never be pathed through by Cowboys.

      • tileEast

        public Tile tileEast
        The Tile to the 'East' of this one (x+1, y). Null if out of bounds of the map.

      • tileNorth

        public Tile tileNorth
        The Tile to the 'North' of this one (x, y-1). Null if out of bounds of the map.

      • tileSouth

        public Tile tileSouth
        The Tile to the 'South' of this one (x, y+1). Null if out of bounds of the map.

      • tileWest

        public Tile tileWest
        The Tile to the 'West' of this one (x-1, y). Null if out of bounds of the map.

      • x

        public int x
        The x (horizontal) position of this Tile.

      • y

        public int y
        The y (vertical) position of this Tile.

        The YoungGun on this tile, null otherwise.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile()
        Creates a new instance of a Tile. Used during game initialization, do not call directly.

    • Method Detail

      • getNeighbors

        public java.util.List<Tile> getNeighbors()
        Gets the neighbors of this Tile
        Returns:
        The neighboring (adjacent) Tiles to this tile

      • isPathable

        public boolean isPathable()
        Checks if a Tile is pathable to units
        Returns:
        True if pathable, false otherwise

      • hasNeighbor

        public boolean hasNeighbor(Tile tile)
        Checks if this Tile has a specific neighboring Tile
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to check against
        Returns:
        true if the tile is a neighbor of this Tile, false otherwise
